original_text: Tell Israel's people that they must bring a bull and a male sheep. They must bring them to sacrifice as a friendship offering to the Lord. They will sacrifice them. They must mix grain and oil to offer with them. They must do that because the Lord will appear to them today.’
korean_text: 또 화목제를 위하여 여호와 앞에 드릴 수소와 숫양을 가져오고 또 기름 섞은 소제물을 가져오라 하라 오늘 여호와께서 너희에게 나타나실 것임이니라 하매

sentences.original_text: Tell Israel's people that they must bring a bull
They must bring them to sacrifice
as a friendship offering to the Lord
They must mix grain and oil
because the Lord will appear to them today
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 주님께서 그들에게 나타나실 것이기 때문이다
